summary: This document is a regulatory alert from Deutsche Bank Private Bank regarding Richard D. Kahn, who was involved in a disciplinary action by NYSE Arca for failing to provide requested testimony. The alert indicates that Kahn is permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership unless he complies with the terms set forth in the decision.

persons.name: Richard D Kahn
persons.context: Richard D. Kahn is mentioned as a respondent in a regulatory action for failing to provide testimony as requested by FINRA on behalf of NYSE Arca.

events.title: Regulatory Action Decision
events.description: Richard Kahn and other respondents were found to have violated NYSE Arca Equities Rule 10.2(d) and were permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership unless they provided testimony within a specified timeframe.

keyFacts: Richard D. Kahn was involved in a regulatory action by NYSE Arca for failing to provide testimony.
The decision against Kahn was issued on April 20, 2012.
Kahn is permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership unless he provides the required testimony within 120 days.
The alert was generated on September 3, 2013.
